feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping PWA install UI updates to affected frontend files and components.

frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Splash screen component that fades out after a timed delay and then triggers onDismiss.

frontend/src/pages/LivePage.tsx: Placeholder page announcing future live audio/video broadcast features.
